meanings.definition: Relating to or derived from wood.
meanings.sent1: The xylic table was beautifully crafted from oak.
meanings.sent2: The xylic aroma of the forest filled the air.
meanings.sent3: The xylic chair seemed to whisper stories of the trees.
meanings.sent4: Her xylic jewelry box held memories of the forest within.
meanings.sent5: The xylic texture of the wooden floor felt comforting underfoot.
